name: Legs Spa Treatment: Shave & Spa & Makeover
name_original: Legs Spa Treatment: Shave & Spa & Makeover
description: Now that the weather outside is getting warmer, this lovely girl can't wait to get into her favorite bikini so that she can lay out on the beach and work on her tan. But after putting on her fashionable swimsuit, she looked down at her legs and realized that she hasn't shaved her legs all week. She doesn't want to show up to the beach with hairy legs. That's why she's decided to treat herself to a day of pampering so that she can have silky smooth legs for her beach day. Follow the instructions to apply various beauty treatments like moisturizing lotion and oatmeal shave cream, then use the razor to give her a close shave so that she can feel fabulous in her bikini this Summer. Once her legs are soft and smooth, browse the wide selection of colorful makeup, cute clothes, cool tattoos and more, to complete her summertime look in this fun spa game for girls!
